com.alma.platform.control

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alma.platform.control.Platform

  • public class Platform
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the BlueSnail platform and is used to manage the different applications/plugin created by user.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String I_MAIN_PLUGIN_PATH
      Class url of the main plugin interface.

      • getInstance

        public static Platform getInstance()
                            throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
                                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Returns the unique instance of the platform.

        The unique platform instance.

        java.util.NoSuchElementException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.io.IOException

      • getListPlugin

        public java.util.List<PluginDescriptor> getListPlugin(java.lang.Class<?> need)
        Returns the list of available plugin with their description from a client need.
        Parameters:
        need - The need of the application. The need is represented by an interface that the plugin must implement.
        Returns:
        A list of available plugin which corresponds to the client need.

      • getListPlugin

        public java.util.List<PluginDescriptor> getListPlugin()
        Returns the list of all available plugins with their description.
        Returns:
        A list which contains all available plugins.

      • getAutorunPlugin

        public java.util.List<PluginDescriptor> getAutorunPlugin()
                                                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Returns the list of autorun plugin from the available plugin, with their description.
        Returns:
        A list of autorun plugin.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • getPluginInstance

        public java.lang.Object getPluginInstance(PluginDescriptor plugin)
        Returns an instance of a plugin.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin description that have to be instanced.
        Returns:
        The instance of the plugin.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

      • getPluginsState

        public java.util.Map<PluginDescriptor,PluginState> getPluginsState()
        Returns the map which contains the state for each plugin. The different states are defined in the PluginState class.
        Returns:
        A map which contains each plugin (key) and their state (value).

      • addMonitor

        public void addMonitor(IMonitor monitor)
        Add a monitor. Monitors are used by the platform to manage the state of each plugin.
        Parameters:
        monitor - An available monitor that implement IMonitor.

      • removeMonitor

        public void removeMonitor(IMonitor monitor)
        Remove a monitor from the list.
        Parameters:
        monitor - The monitor object which have to be removed.

      • notifyMonitor

        public void notifyMonitor()
        Update all monitors.

      • getMonitor

        public java.util.List<IMonitor> getMonitor()
        Returns the list of current monitors.
        Returns:
        The list which contains all loaded monitors.

      • addLog

        public void addLog(java.lang.String log)
        Add a log in the list. Each time a method is called, a log is added.
        Parameters:
        log - A string which represents the log

      • getLog

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLog()
        Returns the list of current log.
        Returns:
        The list which contains all log at a precise time.
